message: Hello Bob, I am offering you our premium product at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece valued at $12,000 for a limited time.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount. However, $10,000 is still a bit out of my price range.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering your budget, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose to sell the product to you for $9,000.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  However, $9,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $8,750.  This is my final offer.

Bob, thank you for your persistence and willingness to negotiate. I value this opportunity as well. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer you the product for $8,900. This is my final offer within your budget.
